Message:
Beyond the “door” was
an abyss sprawling below.
Falling in means
there’s no coming back!
I have to hurry
past the door and...!

Could it be...?
Has our world
been destroyed too...?

No, impossible...
I mean, Lord Samyaza is there!

It can’t be destroyed,
even by the likes of the demons!!
Unless...it was by some...
god of destruction...

I was reeling from disbelief,
when someone shoved me
from behind...

As I fell off the “path,”
down into the abyss,

I saw a thin arm
reaching out into the void.

I woke up to find
myself in the ruins
of some unfamiliar world.

It seemed like a miracle
that I survived,
but I was all alone...
and Caladbolg had lost
all its light...

...This is all my fault...
I lost sight of the mission,
and everyone...

...I have to push forward.
Crying won’t bring anyone back.

If this is all my fault,
then I have to be the one
who makes it right.

After all,
the holy sword Caladbolg
exists to protect everyone...!
